TopicTitle: 3 things I've done that the next user hasn't

Articles.Content:
The goal of this game is to name 3 things that you have done that the user below you hasn't done. I'll start.

3 things I have done that the next user hasn't:

Milked a cow

Taken a telescope on a camping trip

Been questioned by the Secret Service

I have done 2 of those three things. 

I have woken up to find cat vomit dried on my bed.

I have never been to another continent.

I have not recieved a driver's license.

I have done 1 of those things.

I have never been into space

I have never made it to Eeloo

I have not had a cat.
This is just confusing with these double negatives. I have haven't been to space?

I have had a cat, but the others, no.

Three things I have done that the next user hasn't:

I have played a song on a piano that required all ten fingers.

I have thrown a surprise party for someone.

I have hitchhiked a ride from strangers.

I have thrown a surprise party, and in an emergency got into a car with a total stranger though I wasn't technically hitchhiking. I play the piano the way most people type: With my index fingers ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I have flown across the Atlantic.

I have watched a pickup truck full of armed soldiers drive by me on a public road.

I have kept a job with the same company for over 2 decades.

In KSP I have put something into orbit and simultaneously boosted the first stage back to the runway ( bdarmory 150km load range )

In RL? 

I drive an 07' Mustang GT race car. ( Been thinking about putting a KSP sponsor on it )

I have experienced an earth quake on the water. We're out fishing on a lake and US northeast had a fairly large earthquake in Virginia. The epicenter was lake Anna. Well go figure we just happened to take a trip to my cousins lake house on that same lake.

This was after the initial quake, but all weekend we were rocked by aftershocks. So one morning were out in the boat and from nowhere these large, rolling waves appear out of nowhere. Like someone threw a massive boulder in the lake. We get back and there all telling us they just felt a huge aftershock. 

It was one of the more surreal experiences in my life.

I have never done any of those. Cool story though.

I have taken a Lotus Esprit for a test drive with an octogenarian in the passenger seat. Getting into a lotus was a very similar experience to putting on a pair of pants. Tight squeeze.

I once met Douglas Adams (Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy). He claimed to hold the world record for autographing the most towels.

I once convinced an adult there is a Trans-Atlantic Highway.

true true true

know thing

now sing

nothing ; )

I have no idea

bought a thing from a GW store, pledged for star citizen, posted this post.

1. Read the option below

2. Bothered to find the typo above

3. Didn't know that there wasn't a typo to begin with

Technically I can't be wrong.
I've never done those things, but I have eaten a chipati, eaten raw octopus at restaurant on the beach (amazing how good it is fresh, not rubbery at all), thrown a pie in someone's face.

I never done such things.

I've been 3 cm away from Robert Bateman,

Played around with some unarmed artillery in China,

Made several Polandball comics that I never bothered to post on Reddit.

I never did! (any of those)

I played on stage warming up for UK Subs

I played pool in Llangollen

I witnessed 2 in the crowd fighting over my completely ridiculous, absurdly oversized St Patrics Day hat I wore because I wrongly assumed noone would take that hat seriously

I've never done any of those :-)

I have performed as part of a warm-up act for the Duke Ellington Orchestra.

I have had anti-matter injected into my brain in the name of science.

I have driven a motorcycle 100 mph.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-01T02:41:43Z" title="06/01/2015 02:41  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 1, 2015</time> by DarkGravity**

I have never done any of those things.  

I have constructed a drone capable of traveling 310 meters per second in my basement.  

I have created and sold a flying vaccumm cleaner.  

I own a robot.

I've not done any of those.  

I have driven a tractor.  

I have driven a excavator.  

I have started making my own game.

I have not driven a tractor, I did operate an excavator briefly when I was like 5 years old, and I have indeed been making my own game.  

Let's see...  

I have stolen pieces of the United Kingdom.  

I have rebound a book (okay, 80% rebound so far)  

I have touched a moon rock.

Nope...... haven't done any of those  

OK I've driven an armored personnel carrier onto a train car  

played flute onstage at a festival  

caught an alligator with a fishing pole

I have played an instrument onstage, but not a flute.

2)I have been aboard a WWII battleship (and submarine)  

3)I have seen a real Saturn V rocket and Apollo Command Module

1) Ja, ich habe.  

2) Nein!  

3) Nein.

2) Have stayed up late 'til 5:00.  

3) Seen the Eiffel Tower.

3. Went to the Tokyo Skytree (Jokes on you Columbia, I've actually been to a tower that's really tall :P)
